GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.26 to before v4.14.265
GSD.description:
net: fix information leakage in /proc/net/ptype

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.265 by commit c38023032a598ec6263e008d62c7f02def72d5c7, it was introduced in version v2.6.26 by commit 2feb27dbe00cbb4f7d31f90acf6bd0d751dd0a50. For more details please see the references link.
